rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with Vastu-aligned positioning. Use local materials for cost efficiency.
An open-plan space that merges the living and dining areas. Incorporates traditional Chettinad design elements while keeping an airy feel.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with living area; designed for efficiency on a tight budget using local materials.
Spacious master bedroom with Vastu guidelines ensuring proper alignment of the bed and room features.
Cozy guest bedroom incorporating Chettinad aesthetics. Placed to balance energy flow.
Quiet study and library area designed for comfort and concentration.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned with Vastu principles ensuring good energy flow. Designed to be secure while accessible.
